body:
Comment 3: 
Looks like error on my end.
clink_x64.exe go in the builder way (on 32 bit system). I must edit a little clink
starting bat and now Go building without problems.

Thank you for this diff, it helped find where is the problem.

Btw. clink on Windows is great: http://code.google.com/p/clink/ 
(Bringing Bash's powerful command line editing to Microsoft Windows' cmd.exe)

Issue can be closed.

Best regards,
Dobrosław Żybort
